Package com.orbitz.monitoring.api.monitor

Class Summary
AbstractCompositeMonitor An abstract base class suitable for extending to obtain common behavior of CompositeMonitors.
AbstractMonitor A base implementation of Monitor that contains all common aspects of monitors.
AttributeHolder Holds a Monitor attribute value and associated metadata
AttributeMap A map-like class that can be used to hold attributes for a Monitor.
CompositeAttributeHolder CompositeAttributeHolder adds the inheritable meta-data to attributes.
CompositeAttributeMap CompositeAttributeMap provides the additional functionality to have inheritable attributes
EventMonitor A singular event that does not have a duration.
TransactionMonitor A monitor for transactions.
ValueMonitor Monitor that represents a single value of interest.
